Class BuyerManger

public class BuyerManger
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements buyer functions

    • findByName

      private int findByName​(java.lang.String name)
      This method finds index of product in basket
      Parameters:
      name - name of desired product
      Returns:
      index of desired product

    • addToBasket

      public boolean addToBasket​(Site site, java.lang.String name, int count) throws ServiceException
      This method adds product to basket
      Parameters:
      site - site with which user works
      name - name of product
      count - count of product, that user wants to buy
      Returns:
      if product isn't at list of product, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if it was DAOException

    • changeCount

      public boolean changeCount​(Site site, java.lang.String name, int count) throws ServiceException
      This method changes count of product that user wants to buy
      Parameters:
      site - site with which user works
      name - name of product
      count - new count of product, that user wants to buy
      Returns:
      if it is at list of product, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if it was DAOException

    • deleteFromBasket

      public boolean deleteFromBasket​(java.lang.String name) throws ServiceException
      This method deletes product from basket
      Parameters:
      name - name of product
      Returns:
      if it is at list of product, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if it was DAOException

    • buyProduct

      public int buyProduct​(Site site, java.lang.String name) throws ServiceException
      This method emulates a purchase in shop
      Parameters:
      site - site with which user works
      name - name of product
      Returns:
      It will return 1, if it isn't product in basket.It will return 2, if it isn't product in site. It will return 3, if it isn't enough product in stock. It will return 4, if description of product was changed. It will return 0, if purchase was successful
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if it was DAOException
